Description détaillée
Property.
A property is always in a KEY:VALUE structure, and may optionally contain parameters.

__construct (Component $root, $name, $value = null , array $parameters = [] , $group = null )
Creates the generic property.
Parameters must be specified in key=>value syntax.
Paramètres
Component$root
The root document
string$name
string | array | null$value
array$parameters
List of parameters
string$group
The vcard property group

__clone() __cloneProperty Property__clone
__clone ( )
This method is automatically called when the object is cloned. Specifically, this will ensure all child elements are also cloned. Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :
__toString() __toStringProperty Property__toString
__toString ( )
Called when this object is being cast to a string.
If the property only had a single value, you will get just that. In the case the property had multiple values, the contents will be escaped and combined with ,.
Renvoie
string
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :
add() addProperty Propertyadd
add ( $name, $value = null )
Adds a new parameter.
If a parameter with same name already existed, the values will be combined. If nameless parameter is added, we try to guess its name.
Paramètres
string$name
string | array | null$value

destroy() destroyProperty Propertydestroy
destroy ( )
Call this method on a document if you're done using it.
It's intended to remove all circular references, so PHP can easily clean it up.
Réimplémentée à partir de Node. Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :

Returns the value, in the format it should be encoded for JSON.
This method must always return an array.

Returns a multi-valued property.
This method always returns an array, if there was only a single value, it will still be wrapped in an array.

getValue() getValueProperty PropertygetValue
getValue ( )
Returns the current value.
This method will always return a singular value. If this was a multi-value object, some decision will be made first on how to represent it as a string.
To get the correct multi-value version, use getParts.
Renvoie
string

string

setRawMimeDirValue() setRawMimeDirValueProperty PropertysetRawMimeDirValue
setRawMimeDirValue ( $val)[abstract]
Sets a raw value coming from a mimedir (iCalendar/vCard) file.
This has been 'unfolded', so only 1 line will be passed. Unescaping is not yet done, but parameters are not included.
Paramètres
string$val

validate() validateProperty Propertyvalidate
validate ( $options = 0 )
Validates the node for correctness.
The following options are supported:
Node::REPAIR - If something is broken, and automatic repair may be attempted.
An array is returned with warnings.
Every item in the array has the following properties:
level - (number between 1 and 3 with severity information)
message - (human readable message)
node - (reference to the offending node)
Paramètres
int$options
Renvoie
array
Réimplémentée à partir de Node.
